item.title: 马来西亚航空公司十多年来首次实现盈利
item.description: 马来西亚航空公司（Malaysia Airlines）公布了十多年来的首次年度盈利报告，强劲的需求和机票价格的上涨推动了这家陷入困境的航空公司的业绩反弹。【原文：Malaysia Airlines reported its first annual profit in over a decade as strong demand and elevated airfares propel a rebound for the troubled airline.】

item.title: 英国监管机构酝酿养老基金测试，以发现表现不佳者
item.description: 英国养老金监管机构正在权衡一项行业绩效测试，该测试类似于澳大利亚用于淘汰表现不佳基金的指标。【原文：The UK pensions watchdog is weighing an industry performance test that’s similar to a metric used in Australia to weed out underperforming funds.】

item.title: Next 预计将从英国购物者的高消费中获利 10 亿英镑
item.description: Next Plc 预计，随着工资水平的提高，英国购物者将有更多的时间在时装上消费，今年的利润将扩大到近 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元）。【原文：Next Plc expects profit to expand to nearly £1 billion ($1.3 billion) of profit this year as rising wages free up British shoppers to spend more on fashion.】

item.title: 英国 2 月份预算赤字高于预期
item.description: 英国政府上个月的借贷高于预期，这使得英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）在整个财政年度的预算预计将超额完成。【原文：UK government borrowing came in higher than forecast last month, putting Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt on course to overshoot his budget projections for the full fiscal year.】

item.title: 印度主要反对党国大党称投票前被莫迪的政党 "削弱
item.description: 印度主要反对党印度国民大会指责印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的政府试图在财政上 "削弱 "该党，而此时距离印度即将举行的大选还有数周时间。【原文：India’s main opposition party, the Indian National Congress, accused the government of Prime Minister Narendra Modi of trying to “cripple” the party financially, weeks before the country heads to the polls.】

item.description: 随着日本股市在经历了几十年的低迷之后飙升至历史新高，政府现在正试图鼓励散户投资者将他们的十万亿日元现金储蓄投入股市。【原文：As Japanese equities soar to record highs after a decadeslong slump, the government is now trying to encourage retail investors to put their one quadrillion yen in cash savings to work in the stock market.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Shapoorji Pallonji 集团正在与包括国营电力金融公司在内的贷款机构进行谈判，寻求筹集多达 2,000 亿卢比（约合 24 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Shapoorji Pallonji Group is in talks with lenders including state-run Power Finance Corp., seeking to raise as much as 200 billion rupees ($2.4 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 普拉博沃赢得印尼大选遭舞弊指控质疑
item.description: 两名印尼总统候选人对选举机构宣布普拉博沃-苏比安托在上个月的总统选举中获胜提出异议，声称选举过程中存在舞弊行为。【原文：Two Indonesian presidential candidates are disputing the election body’s declaration that Prabowo Subianto won last month’s presidential vote, alleging fraud in the process.】

item.title: 早期数据强劲，中国人民银行仍有下调存款准备金率的空间

item.title: 上田称日本央行若等待时间过长将面临快速加息风险
item.description: 日本央行行长上田和夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，日本央行认为，如果在结束该行大规模宽松计划方面等待太久，就有可能不得不迅速加息。【原文：Governor Kazuo Ueda said the Bank of Japan saw the risk of potentially having to raise interest rates rapidly if it waited too long to end the bank’s massive easing program, a view that prompted the board to make that move on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储加息信号提振工业金属，铜重拾涨势
item.description: 随着美联储释放出满足降息预期的信号，风险偏好情绪升温，美元走软，铜价重拾涨势，本周创下 11 个月以来的新高。【原文：Copper resumed its rally that saw it hit an 11-month high this week, with the Federal Reserve’s signals that it will meet rate-cut expectations bolstering risk appetite and weakening the US dollar.】
